SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.* FROM (
SELECT * FROM VOLUNTEER WHERE DELETED = 'N'
AND LOCATION like '%'||#{location}||'%'
AND STATUS = #{status}
AND VOL_CT_ID = #{category}
AND to_date(#{date}) BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE
ORDER BY VOL_ID DESC) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) A WHERE A.RNUM >= #{start} order by vol_id
